N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 187.5 - Approval of safety program

State Regulations
(a) On the basis of the reports from the Division of Industrial Safety Service and
the State Education Department, the application of the organization, and other
information available, the commissioner shall issue a certificate of approval
or deny the application. (b) A
certificate of approval shall terminate two years after the date of its
issuance, unless earlier revoked as provided in subdivision (c) of this
section. (c) For good cause shown
the commissioner may revoke a certificate of approval after a
hearing. (d) The commissioner or
his authorized representative shall have the right to enter the shop where
safety instruction is conducted and inspect all pertinent conditions, structures, machines, apparatus, devices, equipment and materials therein, and
to question the officers of the organization, teachers or minors for the
purpose of determining compliance with subdivision (b) of section
187.6
of this Part. Notes
